title: How to Trade for a Neon Bow on Animal Jam

steps.headline: Know what a neon bow and arrow is worth.
steps.description: This will help you know what you'll need to get before trading for one. Understand this rarity may change as Animal Jam has a rarity system - items won't remain the same worth forever. For a solid amount of time however, neon bow and arrows have been worth a black short collar, or 10 to 11 den betas. From here, you can save up that worth to trade for a neon bow. To check worths of items, including the neon bow, view the Animal Jam Worth wiki frequently to be sure.

steps.headline: Decide what you will trade for the neon bow.
steps.description:
Decide whether you will trade spikes, the one black short, den betas, etc. Keep in mind, despite certain amounts of items being worth the same as each other, people may accept a trade based on what the items are. For example, 20 clothing betas is fair for a neon bow as it is worth the same thing as 10 den betas, but people would much rather prefer den betas to clothing betas. Between a black short and 10 den betas, people would obviously prefer the black short collar. Pick the item that someone will preferably accept rather than items you may not be able to get a neon bow with despite the worths being the same. Normally, people want a black short collar for a neon bow, so you may want to begin by trading for a black short. Considering how popular spikes are, this may be your best option, especially when it comes to spikes black in color as they are the rarest of all the groups of spikes (e.g. short wrists, long wrists, short collars, long collars). {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/bc\/Screen-Shot-2020-01-19-at-8.49.55-AM.png\/460px-Screen-Shot-2020-01-19-at-8.49.55-AM.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/bc\/Screen-Shot-2020-01-19-at-8.49.55-AM.png\/759px-Screen-Shot-2020-01-19-at-8.49.55-AM.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":272,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":448.9010989010989,"licensing":"

steps.headline: Save up the worth of a neon bow.
Trade those den betas for spikes.
steps.description:
Black short collars are also worth 2 good short collars, usually red and purple. This may be inaccurate to you, since 2 good short collars is not the same worth as 11 den betas, but the worths of spikes are mutually exclusive. This means that in the rarity system, when it comes to spikes, the den beta worths of spikes don't matter when you're trading for rarer spikes. For example, 2 pink longs are worth 32 den betas, but a red long is worth either 2 pink longs or 23-25 den betas. This is just the way the rarity system is built. Because of this, a purple and red short collar would be worth about 14 to 16 den betas, more than what a neon bow is worth in den beta worth. If you're fine with trading more den betas for two spikes to have a higher chance of getting a black short or neon bow with them, you can do so. If not, you can just save up 10 non member den betas (to be sure the other person will accept, unless you can negotiate a lower trade) and trade those directly for the neon bow. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/8e\/Screen-Shot-2020-01-19-at-9.09.17-AM.png\/460px-Screen-Shot-2020-01-19-at-9.09.17-AM.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/8e\/Screen-Shot-2020-01-19-at-9.09.17-AM.png\/759px-Screen-Shot-2020-01-19-at-9.09.17-AM.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":272,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":448.9010989010989,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"} Don't trade for wrists or bad short collars. This is a waste of den betas - again, a black short may be considered to be worth 4 good long wrists, and that would add up to 16 den betas, more than you need to trade for a black short collar. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/81\/Screen-Shot-2020-01-19-at-9.10.34-AM.png\/460px-Screen-Shot-2020-01-19-at-9.10.34-AM.png","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/8\/81\/Screen-Shot-2020-01-19-at-9.10.34-AM.png\/760px-Screen-Shot-2020-01-19-at-9.10.34-AM.png","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":272,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":448.9010989010989,"licensing":"

License: Fair Use<\/a> (screenshot)
\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Trade for a black short collar or for the neon bow.
steps.description: Neon bows are slightly low demand compared to black shorts, so a black short can be considered slightly rarer. However, if you're fine with trading a black short since it almost guarantees an accepted trade, you can trade your spikes or den betas for one. Otherwise, you can attempt to trade your spikes or den betas directly for the neon bow, but it may be easier to trade a black short since it has more demand despite being the same exact worth as a neon bow.
